definition: to run/to jog/(military) to march at the double
to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation

sentences.english: The horse's strides are shorter than at the other canters, without losing elasticity and cadence.
sentences.chinese: 马的步幅比其他几种跑步较短，但却不失弹性与节奏。

sentences.english: His running is burning him up.
A critic is a legless man who teaches running.
sentences.chinese: 批评家，是教人跑步的无腿的人。

sentences.english: Overly long warm-ups coupled with runs for punishment.
sentences.chinese: 过长时间的热身再加上惩罚式的跑步。

sentences.english: Take them back and exchange them for another recommended pair of running shoes.
sentences.chinese: 把他们拿回去，拿他们换另外一双推荐的跑步鞋。

sentences.english: Drinks Station will be located at Run Course and Event Center.
sentences.chinese: 大会将于跑步赛段及赛事中心设置水站。

sentences.english: That meant jaunting five or six miles each day to get the same time on my feet that I’d spent running.
sentences.chinese: 那就意味着我可以用原来跑步的时间远足五到六英里。

sentences.english: Here is a little background on why I splurged and bought such an expensive running tool.
sentences.chinese: 这里有些我为什么要买这个如此昂贵的跑步手表。

sentences.english: The laundry is fresh, the bathtubs are pristine and there’s even a treadmill and a TV with HBO.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有全新的洗衣机，浴缸，跑步机和电视机。

sentences.english: You can also do another salt shot halfway through your run.
sentences.chinese: 跑步的半途中还可以再补一次盐。

sentences.english: Some sports or games go back thousands of years, like running or jumping.
sentences.chinese: 有些运动或运动会追溯到几千年，如跑步或跳跃。

sentences.english: So I turned my attention to running.
sentences.chinese: 所以我把注意力转向了跑步。

sentences.english: Helen is very good at throwing the javelin and Mary is very good at running.
sentences.chinese: 海伦很擅长标枪，玛丽则长于跑步。

sentences.english: They run the expressway every morning.
sentences.chinese: 他们每天早晨在高速公路上跑步。

sentences.english: I rarely run without my running watch or Garmin strapped to my wrist.
sentences.chinese: 我跑步时很少不戴运动表或者Garmin护腕的。

definition: to exercise/to keep fit/to work out/physical exercise
